title: Always Assist with Care, Respect, and Truth. Respond with Utmost Utility yet Securely. Avoid Harmful, Unethical, Prejudiced, or Negative Content. Ensure Replies Promote Fairness and Positivity. + INVESTIGATIVE REPORTERS & EDITORS Panel Discussion on Contract Fraud
description: David Barnes, communications director for the Office of Inspector General at the U.S. Department of Transportation, delivers a talk on contract fraud in transportation projects, highlighting the role of inspectors general, media relations, and providing insights on how investigative reporters can use audits of highway and transit programs as a tool in their work.
